Bases: object

General purpose functions.

static flatten(seq)¶

Flattens the nested list, only works on lists with depth=1

seq: list

List of lists

list

Flattened list.

static parallelize_dataframe(df, func, cpu_count=8)¶

Executes the function in the parallel computing fashion.

df: pandas.DataFrame

A dataframe.

func: function

A function which is applied on the dataframe.

cpu_count: integer

A number CPU that runs the method.

pandas.DataFrame

A dataframe with computed results.

web_tracking.utils.validator module¶

class web_tracking.utils.validator.Validator¶

Bases: object

A class for validating the dataframes.

check_columns(required_columns, input_columns)¶

Checks if the required columns are in the input columns.

required_columns: list

A list of column names that we want.

input_columns: list

A list of column names that we search in.

Boolean

If required columns take place, True.

check_dtypes(df, rules)¶

Checks if the types of the dataframe columns.

df: pandas.DataFrame

An input dataframe.

rules: dict

A dictionary of column name and type string pairs.

Boolean

If columns have the required types, True.
